sentences.en: ...a river trip on bamboo rafts through dense rainforest.
sentences.cn: …一次乘着竹筏穿过茂密雨林的河上旅行。

sentences.en: "Are you sure the raft is safe?" she asked anxiously. "Couldn't be safer," Max assured her confidently.
sentences.cn: “你确定木筏安全吗？”她不安地问道。“再安全不过了，”马克斯信心十足地向她保证道。

sentences.en: a whole raft of new proposals
He clung tightly to the raft to keep himself afloat.
sentences.cn: 他紧紧地贴在木筏上,好让自己浮在水面.

sentences.en: He has surrounded himself with a raft of advisers who are very radical.
sentences.cn: 他周围聚集了一大群偏激的顾问。

sentences.en: I made for the life raft and hung on for dear life.
sentences.cn: 我游到救生筏前，死命地抓住它。

sentences.en: Raft repeatedly hurled verbal abuse at his co-star.
sentences.cn: 拉夫特不断地破口大骂和他联合主演的演员。

sentences.en: She spent seven days afloat on a raft.
sentences.cn: 她在一只木筏上漂泊了七天.
紧紧抓住救生筏的幸存者

sentences.en: The company has launched a whole raft of new software products.
sentences.cn: 公司推出了大量新软件产品。

sentences.en: The crew spent two days and nights in their raft.
sentences.cn: 船员在救生筏上呆了两天两夜。

sentences.en: The raft bobbed along more quietly.
sentences.cn: 小木筏更加平静地漂浮向前。

sentences.en: The raft came close to the rocks and then sheered away.
sentences.cn: 这条木筏划近岩礁,然后迅速转向避开.

sentences.en: The raft gathered speed as the current dragged it toward the falls.
sentences.cn: 水流将木筏拽向瀑布，木筏的速度越来越快。

sentences.en: The sailors got away from the wrecked ship on a raft.
sentences.cn: 水手们乘救生筏离开失事的船.

sentences.en: There was a small log raft there which they meant to capture.
sentences.cn: 那儿有只小木筏,他们打算据为己有.

sentences.en: This is likely to revive consumer spending and a whole raft of consumer industries.
sentences.cn: 这可能会带动消费性支出和一大批消费工业的复苏。

trans.tran_cn: 木筏，橡皮艇，[动]（昆虫的）卵筏，〈美口〉大量
trans.tran_en: a flat floating structure, usually made of pieces of wood tied together, used as a boat
to convey on or travel by raft, or make a raft from
